prompt: Chiikawastyle,Chiikawa,This is a digital drawing in a cute, cartoon style featuring Chiikawa, an adorable white, round-faced creature with a small, closed-mouth smile and closed eyes, giving a peaceful expression. Chiikawa has two small, rounded ears on top of its head and two pink blush marks on its cheeks. The background is a soft, light green with some grassy lines at the top, enhancing the cute, whimsical feel of the image. The overall style is simple and minimalistic, focusing on clean lines and soft colors, creating a charming and endearing visual.
